resources.string: Copywhere
This button is used to capture image from the camera
This button is used to open photo album for selecting an image
This button is used to start a widget on the screen to capture screenshot
Help
This icon gives tips and explanation of how the app can be used
This image view contains the selected image
This button sends the selected image for text extraction
This button opens the Photo album to select an image
This button opens the camera to capture image
This button starts an notification bar service
This layout contains the material appbar
This is the appbar that contains help button and exit button
This is the bottom green box that contains three buttons
copies the text from the selected blocks
this image view holds the processed image
this text box contains the extracted text
this button crops the image in the image view
crop
Screen capture
Notification bar activity to extract text from the last taken screenshot
